title: illusioNiZt
author: illusioNiZt
content: Will provide HQ articles on any category you want.Can provide content daily/weekly, Looking for long term work.PM me to know more details/to check my past work.Base rate I would say 5$/100 words.But I am willing to negotiate according to your requirement.Payments in BTC.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: these days it is quite a hot topic with excellent AI alternatives for writing articles, now I see that you offer items from any category here. do you also use one of the AI writer helpers I find it a bit unbelievable that you (or anyone else) can deliver quality regardless of the topic you are writing about?Can you give us some tips on how to recognise articles written by humans in regard to AI writing tools? Some of your examples?

comments.author: illusioNiZt
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on January 10, 2023, 10:08:48 AMthese days it is quite a hot topic with excellent AI alternatives for writing articles, now I see that you offer items from any category here. do you also use one of the AI writer helpers I find it a bit unbelievable that you (or anyone else) can deliver quality regardless of the topic you are writing about?Can you give us some tips on how to recognise articles written by humans in regard to AI writing tools? Some of your examples?We do take help from AI apps depending on your request, also there is really no way to figure out(correct me if I am wrong)if someone has manually edited a AI written article, really hard to tell if the content is 100% written by a person, but you can do a plagiarism check.
